```{r read gender data}
gender <- read_excel(here::here("data/1.+offenders,+australia.xls"), sheet = 3, col_types = c("text", rep("numeric", 22))) %>%
  rename("2008" = ...2,
         "2009" = ...3,
         "2010" = ...4,
         "2011" = ...5,
         "2012" = ...6,
         "2013" = ...7,
         "2014" = ...8,
         "2015" = ...9,
         "2016" = ...10,
         "2017" = ...11,
         "2018" = ...12) 
```

```{r}
male_count <- gender[7:22, 1:12] %>%
  mutate(sex = "male") 
female_count <- gender[24:39, 1:12] %>%
  mutate(sex = "female") 
both_count <- gender[41:56, 1:12] %>%
  mutate(sex = "both") 
```
